author: senh
title: Eight prime locations for a destination wedding on a budget
text: BING NEWS: Eight prime locations for a destination wedding on a budget Famous for its Seven Mile Beach -- one of the softest and longest beaches in the country -- Negril, Jamaica, is a popular spot for destination weddings, and couples and guests can save cash here in many ways: Not only are the room rates low, but public ... 07/1/2015 - 12:56 am | View Link Hyatt Zilara and Hyatt Ziva Launch Big Day Preview Couples planning a destination wedding can reserve a Big Day Preview by contacting ... collection of 14 premier hotels comprising 6,175-rooms that are located in prime beach locations in Mexico, the Dominican Republic and Jamaica. In 2013, Playa Hotels ... 06/26/2015 - 7:28 am | View Link 12 Wedding Destinations In India For Every Kind Of Couple Andaman and Nicobar Islands - For the adventurous couple Andaman and Nicobar islands have a ton of locations for your much awaited ... islands are reasons enough for Lakshadweep to be a prime wedding destination choice! If you're a couple that prefers ... 05/22/2015 - 7:30 am | View Link Average Australian wedding costs $65,482 The average cost of a wedding for ... in tropical and unusual locations have become more accessible to average Australians.
